meanings.definition: A mischievous or rowdy person, especially a young man.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood larrikin was always causing trouble with his pranks.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends enjoyed the company of their favorite larrikin at the party.
meanings.sent3: The larrikin's playful antics kept everyone entertained during the school play.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a larrikin spread through the town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous larrikin left a trail of chaos wherever he went.

meanings.definition: A person who behaves in a playful or irresponsible way.
meanings.sent1: The young larrikin loved to play practical jokes on his friends.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the office larrikin for her playful attitude towards work.
meanings.sent3: The larrikin's carefree nature sometimes got him into trouble with his teachers.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter made her the social larrikin of the group.
meanings.sent5: The irresponsible larrikin forgot his keys for the third time this week.
